RAD_DATASOURCES.RELATION_WITH_PARENT: LFTMS_SPREAD_MASTER.CONTRACT_REF_NO = LFTMS_SPREAD_CCY.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND LFTMS_SPREAD_MASTER.CUSTOMER_NO = LFTMS_SPREAD_CCY.CUSTOMER_NO AND LFTMS_SPREAD_MASTER.BRANCH_CODE = LFTMS_SPREAD_CCY.BRANCH_CODE AND LFTMS_SPREAD_MASTER.PRODUCT_CODE = LFTMS_SPREAD_CCY.PRODUCT_CODE

LFTMS_SPREAD_CCY.CONTRACT_REF_NO = LFTMS_SPREAD_EFFDATE.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND LFTMS_SPREAD_CCY.CUSTOMER_NO = LFTMS_SPREAD_EFFDATE.CUSTOMER_NO AND LFTMS_SPREAD_CCY.BRANCH_CODE = LFTMS_SPREAD_EFFDATE.BRANCH_CODE AND LFTMS_SPREAD_CCY.PRODUCT_CODE = LFTMS_SPREAD_EFFDATE.PRODUCT_CODE AND LFTMS_SPREAD_CCY.CURRENCY = LFTMS_SPREAD_EFFDATE.CURRENCY

LFTMS_SPREAD_EFFDATE.CONTRACT_REF_NO = LFTMS_SPREAD_RATE.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND LFTMS_SPREAD_EFFDATE.CUSTOMER_NO = LFTMS_SPREAD_RATE.CUSTOMER_NO AND LFTMS_SPREAD_EFFDATE.BRANCH_CODE = LFTMS_SPREAD_RATE.BRANCH_CODE AND LFTMS_SPREAD_EFFDATE.PRODUCT_CODE = LFTMS_SPREAD_RATE.PRODUCT_CODE AND LFTMS_SPREAD_EFFDATE.CURRENCY = LFTMS_SPREAD_RATE.CURRENCY AND LFTMS_SPREAD_EFFDATE.EFFECTIVE_DATE = LFTMS_SPREAD_RATE.EFFECTIVE_DATE

RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT D.CONTRACT_REF_NO,D.USER_REF_NO,D.CONTRACT_CCY FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT D WHERE D.MODULE_CODE='OL' AND D.PRODUCT_TYPE='L' AND D.AUTH_STATUS='A' AND D.CONTRACT_STATUS='A' AND D.BRANCH=GLOBAL.CURRENT_BRANCH /* AND D.CONTRACT_REF_NO NOT IN(SELECT DISTINCT E.CONTRACT_REF_NO FROM LFTMS_SPREAD_MASTER E WHERE E.CONTRACT_REF_NO = E.CONTRACT_REF_NO) */ AND D.PRODUCT_CODE IN(SELECT DISTINCT PRODUCT FROM OLTMS_PRODUCT_MASTER_LD WHERE PRODUCT=D.PRODUCT_CODE AND PRODUCT_TYPE='L' AND SPREAD_TYPE='S') UNION SELECT 'ALL',NULL,NULL FROM DUAL
SELECT DISTINCT B.CUSTOMER_NO,B.CUSTOMER_NAME1 FROM OLTMS_CUSTOMER B UNION SELECT DISTINCT 'ALL','ALL' FROM DUAL

SELECT A.PRODUCT_CODE, B.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT A, OLTMS_PRODUCT B WHERE A.PRODUCT_CODE = B.PRODUCT_CODE AND ((A.PRODUCT_CODE IN (SELECT DISTINCT PRODUCT FROM OLTMS_PRODUCT_MASTER_LD WHERE PRODUCT = A.PRODUCT_CODE AND PRODUCT_TYPE = 'L' AND SPREAD_TYPE = 'S') AND A.MODULE_CODE = 'OL' AND A.PRODUCT_TYPE = 'L' AND A.CONTRACT_REF_NO = ?) OR (A.PRODUCT_CODE IN (SELECT DISTINCT PRODUCT FROM OLTMS_PRODUCT_MASTER_LD WHERE PRODUCT = A.PRODUCT_CODE AND PRODUCT_TYPE = 'D' AND TENOR_BASED_SPREAD = 'Y') AND A.MODULE_CODE = 'OL' AND A.PRODUCT_TYPE = 'D' AND ? = 'ALL' AND ? = 'ALL'))UNION SELECT 'ALL', 'ALL' FROM DUAL

SELECT A.CONTRACT_CCY CCY, B.CCY_NAME CCY_NAME FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT A, CYTMS_CCY_DEFN B WHERE A.CONTRACT_CCY = B.CCY_CODE AND A.MODULE_CODE = 'OL' AND A.PRODUCT_TYPE = 'L' AND A.CONTRACT_REF_NO = ? UNION SELECT CCY_CODE, CCY_NAME FROM CYTM_CCY_DEFN WHERE ? ='ALL'
